newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: RESEARCH ALERT - Urbancorp says Alaska a buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Urbancorp says Alaska a buy.

text.p: Urbancorp Securities Inc said on Thursday it had given Alaska Milk Corp a buy recommendation due to its prospects of higher earnings next year.
The company recently launched a wider marketing strategy for its two new products, a ready-to-drink milk and a follow-on milk for children.
Prices of skimmed milk powder, a major raw material for Alaska, have also softened due to increased milk production in Australia and New Zealand in the second half of the year, Urbancorp said.

"With Alaska Milk's expanded product variants and the softening of skimmed milk powder prices, we recommend investors to buy the issue for its recovery," the local stockbroker said in a research report.
Alaska is currently trading at 1.96 pesos a share.
